mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet(pet_no, pet_name, pet_age, pet_weight, pet_thumbs ,pet_thumb, pet_gender, pet_kind,pet_image,pet_specific,member_no) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(pet_no), 0)+1 as pet_no FROM pet), #{pet_name}, #{pet_age}, #{pet_weight}, #{pet_thumbs},#{pet_thumb},#{pet_gender}, #{pet_kind}, #{pet_image}, #{pet_specific}, #{member_no})
mapper.select: SELECT pet_no, pet_name, pet_age, pet_weight, pet_gender, pet_kind, pet_image, pet_thumbs, pet_thumb, pet_specific, member_no FROM pet ORDER BY pet_no ASC
SELECT pet_no, pet_name, pet_age, pet_weight, pet_gender, pet_kind, pet_image, pet_thumbs, pet_thumb, pet_specific, member_no FROM pet WHERE member_no=#{member_no} ORDER BY pet_no ASC
